title: Average ticket price Indiana Pacers ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average ticket price in U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2008/09, slightly decreasing from 2008/09 to 2009/10, roughly constant from 2009/10 to 2014/15, and finally slightly increasing from 2014/15 to 2015/16.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008/09 and 2009/10.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 42.39 was reported at Year 2006/07, and 2007/08
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 29.13 was reported at Year 2010/11
